title: Netflix Login Page
description: Netflix Login Experience – A sleek MERN-stack clone replicating Netflix’s login flow, featuring secure authentication, responsive design, and smooth, modern UI interactions.

title: Apple Clone
description: Fully responsive Apple website UI clone built with React and TailwindCSS.

title: Weather App
description: A weather forecast app using API integration and clean UI.

title: Nostra E-commerce
description: An e-commerce website frontend design made with HTML, JS, and TailwindCSS.

title: Movie App
description: A movie search app using TMDB API with search and filter functionality.

title: Udemy Clone
description: A frontend clone of the Udemy homepage with responsive design using React and TailwindCSS.

title: Bulk Mail
description: BulkMail Pro – A MERN-based application that sends bulk emails in one click, designed to help businesses streamline communication and reach large audiences efficiently.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: A modern personal portfolio website built with React, TailwindCSS, and Framer Motion, showcasing projects, skills, and contact information.

title: Full-Stack E-commerce
description: A complete MERN-based e-commerce application with product management, cart, wishlist, and secure authentication.

title: Task Manager App
description: A task management app built with React and TailwindCSS, featuring CRUD operations, status tracking, and smooth UI.
